name: thread
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: thread
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: (a length of) a very thin fibre
a long, thin line of something such as light or smoke

example.eg: A thin thread of light made its way through the curtains.
example.egtrans: 一缕光线透过帘子照进来。

dsense.name: thread
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: The thread of a book, discussion, speech, etc. is its story or the way that it develops, one part connecting with another

example.eg: One of the main threads of the film is the development of the relationship between the boy and his uncle.
example.egtrans: 电影的一条主线是男孩和他叔叔之间关系的发展。

example.eg: The sound distracted me and I lost the thread of (= forgot) what I was saying.
example.egtrans: 我被那个声音打扰了，忘了刚才在说什么。

trans_examp.trans_en: a connected group of pieces of writing on the internet, where people are talking about a particular subject

example.eg: I was so glad to find this thread, and to know that lots of people have the same problem as me!
example.egtrans: 我很高兴看到这张帖子，发现很多人也有我同样的问题！

dsense.name: thread
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a continuous raised line, such as the one that goes around the outside of a screw or bolt or the inside of a hole

name: thread
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: thread
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put something long and thin such as string or thread through a narrow hole or into a small space

example.eg: The sari had gold strands threaded through the material.
example.egtrans: 这件莎丽的布料间穿上了金线。

dsense.name: thread
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove hair from someone's face using a long piece of thread

example.eg: Have you ever had your eyebrows threaded?
example.egtrans: 你有没有用长细线修过眉毛？
